text: Alaha hi hai jisa ne bina ajihe thama de jihare tuhanu dikha'i dide hana ate akasa nu uca kita. Phira uha apane asana upara birajamana ho'i'a. Usa ne suraja ate cana nu ika niyama de vica banhi'a. (Isa nahim) hareka apane apane niyata same anusara calade hana. Alaha hi hareka karaja di vivasatha karada hai. Uha nisani'am nu sapasata rupa nala varanana karada hai, tam ki tusi apane raba di milani da visavasa karo
